                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Produces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ++  rol  |=  [b=bloq c=@ d=@]  ^-  @
               =+  e=(sit d)
               =+  f=(bex (sub a b))
               =+  g=(mod c f)
               (sit (con (lsh b g e) (rsh b (sub f g) e)))

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  > `@ux`(~(rol fe 6) 4 3 0xabac.dedf.1213)
    0x1213.0000.abac.dedf

    > `@ux`(~(rol fe 6) 4 2 0xabac.dedf.1213)
    0xdedf.1213.0000.abac

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 1 'dfgh')
    'hdfg'

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 2 'dfgh')
    'ghdf'

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 0 'dfgh')
    'dfgh'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ++ror

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Roll right

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Rolls d to the right by c b-sized blocks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Accepts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a is a bloq.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              b is a bloq.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              c is an atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              d is an atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Produces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ++  ror  |=  [b=bloq c=@ d=@]  ^-  @
               =+  e=(sit d)
               =+  f=(bex (sub a b))
               =+  g=(mod c f)
               (sit (con (rsh b g e) (lsh b (sub f g) e)))

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  > `@ux`(~(ror fe 6) 4 1 0xabac.dedf.1213)
    0x1213.0000.abac.dedf

    > `@ux`(~(ror fe 6) 3 5 0xabac.dedf.1213)
    0xacde.df12.1300.00ab

    > `@ux`(~(ror fe 6) 3 3 0xabac.dedf.1213)
    0xdf12.1300.00ab.acde

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 0 'hijk')
    'hijk'

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 1 'hijk')
    'khij'

    > `@t`(~(rol fe 5) 3 2 'hijk')
    'jkhi'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ++sit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enforce modulo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Produces an atom in the current modular block representation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Accepts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a is a bloq.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              b is an atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Produces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ++  sit  |=(b=@ (end a 1 b))

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  > (~(sit fe 3) 255)
    255

    > (~(sit fe 3) 256)
    0

    > (~(sit fe 3) 257)
    1

    > (~(sit fe 2) 257)
    1

    > (~(sit fe 2) 10.000)
    0

    > (~(sit fe 2) 100)
    4

    > (~(sit fe 2) 19)
    3

    > (~(sit fe 2) 17)
    1

    > (~(sit fe 0) 17)
    1

    > (~(sit fe 0) 0)
    0

    > (~(sit fe 0) 1)
    1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ++sum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sums two numbers in this modular field.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Accepts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a is a bloq.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              b is an atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              c is an atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Produces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An atom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ++  sum  |=([b=@ c=@] (sit (add b c)))

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  > (~(sum fe 3) 10 250)
    4

    > (~(sum fe 0) 0 1)
    1

    > (~(sum fe 0) 0 2)
    0

    > (~(sum fe 2) 14 2)
    0

    > (~(sum fe 2) 14 3)
    1

    > (~(sum fe 4) 10.000 256)
    10.256

    > (~(sum fe 4) 10.000 100.000)
    44.464
